OUTLINE : This phase I , dose-escalation trial modify vaccinia virus ankara vaccine express p53 ( MVAp53 ) .Patients receive MVAp53 subcutaneously ( SC ) day 0 , 21 , 42 absence unacceptable toxicity . After completion study treatment , patient follow annually 5 year .
